article_text:
Brittany Johnson Hernandez is Deputy Director, Federal Affairs at the March of Dimes Office of Government Affairs. She manages the March of Dimes’ federal policy agenda related to health care access and quality, including Affordable Care Act implementation and Medicaid expansion.

Prior to joining the March of Dimes, Ms. Hernandez was Senior Legislative Assistant to Rep. Steve Cohen (TN-09), handling his healthcare portfolio. She staffed Rep. Cohen throughout the healthcare reform debate and implementation of the law. Ms. Hernandez holds a BA from the University of Memphis in History and Political Science.

article_metadata.description: Brittany Hernandez | At the intersection of health, health care, and policy.

article_summary:
Brittany Johnson Hernandez is Deputy Director, Federal Affairs at the March of Dimes Office of Government Affairs.
Ms. Hernandez holds a BA from the University of Memphis in History and Political Science.
Prior to joining the March of Dimes, Ms. Hernandez was Senior Legislative Assistant to Rep. Steve Cohen (TN-09), handling his healthcare portfolio.
She manages the March of Dimes’ federal policy agenda related to health care access and quality, including Affordable Care Act implementation and Medicaid expansion.
She staffed Rep. Cohen throughout the healthcare reform debate and implementation of the law.
